HOME.RULE1: Go to settings, click on "Enable Geolocation" and click on the button for "Set Current location as Home".
HOME.RULE2: One tree grows every {{var1}} seconds you stay at home.
HOME.RULE3: One tree is cut down every {{var1}} seconds you are not home.
HOME.RULE4: There are levels that you can achieve by growing a certain number of trees: 10, 20, 40, 80, etc.
